title: No matter what website I browse such as bing image, Github, CSDN Blog, etc., firefox always crashes randomly.
content: No matter what website I browse such as bing image, Github, CSDN Blog, etc., firefox always crashes randomly. I uninstalled and reinstalled it and the crash happened again. The crash report IDs are bp-b911c096-525b-4e37-b755-2c5630230818 and bp-937c99d3-7c33-47b3-aac1-c71980230818. I sincerely hope that someone can help me with it, I‘m more than appreciated.
creator: niederlande97

title: browser history spazzing glitch
content: Was scrolling down my browser history today and noticed the scroll bar was slightly jumping. I thought i was hallucinating or something, so i recorded it to confirm im not crazy. Investigating the source of the scroll bar jumping, i scrolled down to find the point of where the entries were disappearing and reappearing.. it was really trippy like it was breathing in and out... i'm still staring at it after many hours wondering how this happened from a programmers point of view... im not sure if its an issue with mozilla or if its my harddrive that needs to be reseated or something.. but this anomoly has me interested now, im wondering if anyone else has seen this glitch of the spazzing entries in browser history
creator: masc0

title: No puedo pegar textos ni enlaces en WhatsApp
content:
Hola.

Por algún motivo no puedo pegar textos ni enlaces en WhatsApp Web. — Solamente puedo si el texto proviene desde la propia página, pero si quiero pegar un texto desde un sitio en Wikipedia, una traducción de Google o simplemente un enlace de YouTube, no reconoce la acción y no se pega.

Esto es FUNDAMENTAL para seguir usando Firefox, porque es importante para mi trabajo. En caso de no conseguir una solución, procederé a cambiar de navegador.

Saludos.
creator: soyunsuarez

title: Why the hell copy and paste stop work from nothing?
content:
Firefox simple do not paste on webwhatsapp any more.

I'd tried EVERYTHING!!!!!!!!!!

Disable addons, run it in safe mode, clean install AND NOTHING!

If i go to dom.event.clipboardevents.enable and set it to false, it works for texts AND STOP TO WORK FOR IMAGES! What the HELL IS THAT?

I've look for some solution in web and found THE SAME ISSUE FROM LIKE 10 YEARS AGO AND NO SOLUTION FOR THIS AT ALL.

Don't you guys don't solve a simple copy and paste problem that affects the browser for 10 YEARS????????????????????????????????????????

Stop make people do some called "tweaks" to solve a simple task as copy and paste things, and screw other simple tasks like COPY AND PASTE A SIMPLE IMAGE!

It's 2023, for God sake!

Solve this! My life is your freaking browser!
creator: freitasabreu

title: Firefox for Mac OS, iPad etc
content:
I am having Mac desktop browsing problems with Firefox - clicking is slow and sometime unresponsive, or erratic - and none of that with Safari. It's not hardware or bandwidth... is it a buggy new update, or maybe Apple shenanigans? I am actually asking that because my iPad Firefox browser started being buggy too - it's not opening cached pages Thanks for the help!

Firefox 116.0.2 Monterey 12.1
creator: marino3

title: whatsapp copy paste not working
content:
Today, the function of copying and pasting a simple text from the notepad in the WhatsApp Web chat has become a nightmare.

I have tried with the "control + V" key, "control shift + V" and with the copy/paste tool in the bookmarks bar and none of them work.

I have also tried restarting Fireforx in troubleshooting mode and restarting the computer and this option does not work either.

I should also mention that when entering my bank's password field, I am unable to paste my password. IMPORTANT NOTE:

If I enter with Google Chrome, then if I can copy and paste.

My Firefox version is 115.1.0esr (64-bit)

Thank you.
creator: Estepario
